passage.title: Three boy's hobbies
passage.paragraph: Look at the three boys. They are my good friends. They all like sports very much.
This is Mike. He is good at football. He likes swimming. He often plays table tennis with his sister. But he doesn't like playing basketball.
This is Jim. He likes to play ping-pong, too. But he doesn't like football or basketball. And his favourite sport is swimming.
This is Tom. He doesn't like table tennis. Football is his favourite sport. He is also good at swimming. And he often plays basketball on Sundays.
